game.name: Pixel Trouble
game.shortDescription: 이 게임에서 당신은 당신의 자신의 능력을 테스트 할 수 있습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Pixel trouble - In this unusual platformer, you take on the role of a dim-witted knight who decided to become famous by accomplishing several feats. He chose the ghosts who fled from the cemetery as his goal, but here's the bad luck - the sword cannot injure the undead!

reviewHighlights.text: Pixel Trouble is a simple, unpretentious platformer.
A dynamic and challenging platformer with nice pixel graphics and good character animations.
